correctness.rationale: Multiple major issues against both the article and the schema. Schema violations: (1) processParameters.plasmaPower is null, but the schema requires an object and disallows null/empty values; omit it for TALD. Unit/quantity errors: (2) purgeTime values are given as 10 ms and 6 ms, whereas the article reports 10 s and 6 s; with the schema’s MilliSEC unit these should be 10000 ms and 6000 ms. Factual/traceability problems: (3) Many values are invented and not reported in the paper (growthPerCycle 0.3 Å, flowRates for precursors/purge, saturation=True, nucleationPeriod=5 cycles, exact filmThickness=60 nm, refractive index, absorption coefficient, band gap by UV–Vis/Tauc, resistivity, carrier density, mobility, uniformity %, conformality AR, elemental concentrations and Zn:O ratio by XPS, roughness by AFM, film density by XRR, and all TFT device properties). The paper does not provide these, nor any device data. (4) Reactor “manufacturer” set to NSRRC is not stated and is not a manufacturer; misinterpretation. (5) Carrier/purging gas listed as nitrogen is not explicitly specified for these experiments (only a general statement about inert gas such as nitrogen is given), so not strictly traceable. (6) The pressure value (2 Torr) refers to purge pressure per the article; using it as the deposition pressure is potentially misleading. Correct items include method (TALD), material (ZnO), substrate (c-plane sapphire), delivery method (FRI), temperature example (40 °C), pulses (DEZn 10 ms, H2O 15 ms), 200 cycles, and thickness range (50–80 nm), but the numerous inaccuracies and schema violation dominate. Properties to correct/review: remove null plasmaPower; fix purgeTime units; remove or mark unknown all unreported optical/electrical/composition/uniformity/conformality/device metrics; revise reactor manufacturer; avoid asserting carrier/purging gas unless stated; clarify pressure context.

completeness.rationale: Largely incomplete and non-traceable to the article with several schema issues. The paper reports ZnO ALD using DEZn/H2O with flow‑rate interruption (stock mode) and compares to non‑stock mode across a temperature range (25–160+ °C), 200 cycles, pulse times (DEZn 10 ms, H2O 15 ms), stock period 3 s for both reactants, purge and pump periods of 10 s and 6 s, purge pressure 2 Torr, c-plane sapphire substrate, epitaxial films, XRD and PL only. The extracted data include only a single process at 40 °C and omit the non‑stock mode and the temperature series described, violating the multiple-process requirement. Several values are incorrect or ungrounded: purge/pump times are entered as 10 ms and 6 ms (should be 10,000 ms and 6,000 ms to match 10 s and 6 s); stock period (3 s) is not captured at all; many parameters are fabricated and not in the article (flow rates, growth per cycle, saturation flag, nucleation period, supercycle design details, refractive index, absorption, bandgap via Tauc, electrical properties, uniformity, conformality, XPS composition/ratio, AFM roughness, film density, TFT device metrics, safety/reproducibility). Carrier/purging gas set to nitrogen is not explicitly stated. Reactor “manufacturer” as NSRRC is not evidenced. Schema issues: plasmaPower is set to null (type/object expected), and purge/pump time unit/value mismatch. To improve: (1) add separate processes for stock and non‑stock modes (and, if extracted, representative temperatures or clearly state which single condition is captured); (2) correct purge and pump times to 10,000 ms and 6,000 ms; (3) capture the stock period of 3 s per reactant (if schema cannot represent it, note limitation, but do not invent other fields); (4) remove unreported values (flow rates, GPC, nucleation period, saturation, supercycle design specifics, optical/electrical/device, composition, roughness, density, uniformity/conformality) unless directly supported by the text; (5) retain only traceable items: TALD, DEZn/H2O, substrate, FRI delivery, 200 cycles, film thickness ~50–80 nm (use a representative value cautiously), 2 Torr purge pressure, epitaxial crystallinity by XRD, PL characterization note; (6) fix schema compliance (do not use null for plasmaPower).
